Zeni: No, I can still fight.

Arrow: You ignoramus! What about your friggin=
g wounded soldier!? I hate you stupid Chivtrons, you let your own kind die!=
!!

Arrow starts crying.

Arrow thinking: I'm going to take my kid, and I'm=
 going to leave this hellhole and find someplace else to be. We'll be just =
fine...
